Articles.Content:
Suggestion: Could you put some information about what the Kerbin-SideJobs contract pack is in the first post? I've read back about 10 pages and still can't find a description.

Can do. I assumed it was pretty obvious. Sorry.

- - - Updated - - -

Thanks for your advise. It seems that I deleted the file from the zip. Downloaded it again and hey there it is. Sorry for taking your time. My fault.

So now itÃ‚Â´s time to launch.

Edit:

IÃ‚Â´m using mechjeb2 and so I wrote a custom "LandingSites.cfg" for all Kerbinside runways to have some autopilot guidance.

Also includes 1 Kerbinside Helipad for the landing guidance as an example how to create such.

Most runways tested and optimized for 3Ã‚Â° landing (when itÃ‚Â´s possible due to landscape) in both ways.

Now IÃ‚Â´m a little bit short in time, so I think the 2 or 3 unoptimized (MJ2 does its job) and the optimised will give you

a good autopilot guidance with MJ2/Kerbinside. Have fun testing these.


MechJeb2Landing
{
    LandingSites
    {    
        Site
        {
            name = KSHP Blue Bay
            latitude = 1.887987
            longitude = -11.213193
            body = Kerbin
        }
    }
    Runways
    {
        Runway    
        {
            name = Green Coast
            body = Kerbin
            start
            {
                latitude = -3.493135
                longitude = 179.090357
                altitude = 220.38
            }
            end
            {
                latitude = -3.423834
                longitude = 179.208385
                altitude = 221.98
            }
        }
        Runway    
        {
            name = Dundards Edge Runway

Linked in OP. Thank you sir.

I thank you for this nice mod.

Here a few screens from optimising.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Edited July 1, 2015 by Dante Montana

v1.0.3 of KerbinSide (All of It in 1) now available from KerbalStuff.

Changelog:

- Added new runway model.

- Added a new base, South Hope, using the new model.

- Included latest Kerbal Konstructs, v0.8.1.

- This comes with new launch refund and recovery mechanics.

- All KerbinSide bases have been updated to utilise the new mechanics.

- Updated licence, allowing for re-distribution of edited config files. This means you can now release base packs using KerbinSide assets.
is it possible to create a Launchpad/runway on another planet from using the in game editor and launch from it

Impressive. Nice model, good placement. Makes a lot of fun playing with this.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

is it possible to create a Launchpad/runway on another planet from using the in game editor and launch from it

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/105247-1-0-4-Kerbal-Konstructs-v0-8-1-Welease-Woderick?p=1671998&viewfull=1#post1671998

- - - Updated - - -

Impressive. Nice model, good placement. Makes a lot of fun playing with this.

Thank you. Would rep but I gotta spread it around apparently.
Was there ever a VLT analouge in this pack? I don't mean the dish array, but the actual telescope. And if there was, is it still in the pack?
Is there a way to edit the location and orientation of an existing base, or do I need to use the Kerbal Konstructs menu to build one from scratch (can that be done?)?

Full tutorial here; http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/105247-1-0-4-Kerbal-Konstructs-v0-8-2-Lisps-Aren-t-Funny?p=1636042&viewfull=1#post1636042

You can create new bases or edit existing bases. You can't relocate an entire base in one go, if that's what you mean.
Thank you.

I just posted a challenge, using KerbinSide Air-Race alongside Kerbal Foundries. Build an anti-grav craft that can complete the KSC course!

Details here, video below:

I just posted a challenge, using KerbinSide Air-Race alongside Kerbal Foundries. Build an anti-grav craft that can complete the KSC course!

Details here, video below:

Really good fun, will have to give this a shot. What did you use to record the vid?

Really good fun, will have to give this a shot. What did you use to record the vid?

You'd be most welcome, and I hope to see your entry soon!

I used Bandicam because it has some nice features that made it worth the expense to me. But I think there are some free options too, like CamStudio Open Broadcast Software.

(Update: I struck out CamStudio due to malware being included in the installer. Many thanks to magico13 for proposing an alternative.)

Edited July 10, 2015 by LitaAlto

You'd be most welcome, and I hope to see your entry soon!

I used Bandicam because it has some nice features that made it worth the expense to me. But I think there are some free options too, like CamStudio.

CamStudio is a no go as BitDefender identifies the download repository as having malware. Shame really.

CamStudio is a no go as BitDefender identifies the download repository as having malware. Shame really.

Open Broadcast Software (OBS) is a great free video recorder. It's used a lot for Twitch streaming, but it can record to a file just as well. I've used it for a bunch of things in the past.

https://obsproject.com/

Edited July 8, 2015 by magico13
How do I get the Kerbal Konstructs thing to see the air race sites?

How do I get the Kerbal Konstructs thing to see the air race sites?

Uhh ... download and install the air race package from the OP?

CamStudio is a no go as BitDefender identifies the download repository as having malware. Shame really.

Same here actually, I had webroot look at the installer file and it has some sort of malware in it, or potential threat in it anyway.

Same here actually, I had webroot look at the installer file and it has some sort of malware in it, or potential threat in it anyway.

I'll update my post to use magico13's suggestion. Sorry I picked a bad example!

Open Broadcast Software (OBS) is a great free video recorder. It's used a lot for Twitch streaming, but it can record to a file just as well. I've used it for a bunch of things in the past.

https://obsproject.com/

Hey Spacepetscompany, is there an ETA on the new assets you were showing off a couple pages back? Considering the recent change in licensing I've been thinking about getting started on my own KK submod.

As promised, coming soon, plug-in support for Air-Race!

A few little tweaks still to make and this feature will be shipping with the next version of Kerbal Konstructs.

Edited July 12, 2015 by AlphaAsh

Welcome to the forums.

More likely there are missing textures. Try re-installing KerbinSide first. Then update Kerbal Konstructs. If that doesn't help, then you can find help with ATM compatibility in the first post of the Kerbal Konstructs thread.

v1.3 of KerbinSide Air-Race available from KerbalStuff.

Changelog:

- Added a new track at Dundard's Edge.

- Additional start and finish models adapted to work with new KK plug-in support.

- All track gates updated to work with new KK plug-in support.

- Included latest version of Kerbal Konstructs which has support for air racing!

- To start the new feature, open the Base Boss in flight and click the button 'I want to race!'

Edited July 13, 2015 by AlphaAsh

After deleteing the medzous and kerbinside folders from my game data, installing it again from the all in 1 kerbinside pack, and getting 5th horseman`s fix, the textures are still bugged.
